title: Day 3 of ping that won't drop below 300 while playing. Any fixes coming?
body: It seems since this last patch that ping as become unstable to the point I can't even play the game. Originally I didn't have a problem with it but a couple friends did. However, the past three days I have been getting it as well. I've cleaned my computer, League has been the only thing running, and I know my internet connection isn't that bad. So I was wondering if there was anything being fixed?

replies.body: There are same issues in NA. I am from New Jersey and I cannot seem to be able to get ping below 500 here for some reason.
Yeah I'm from the east as well. I'm from Ohio and my friends here have been having problems with is as well

Go to this post: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/UcwWHzsV-something-interesting-about-lag-issues-in-na?comment=00010000 and do the steps. At the end you should have a table post it there and show the rioters it not just our ISPs!!!
Is this still occurring, or has it been resolved by now? There were some issues with certain routes coming from Canada to our servers, but I've been notified that those issues were resolved.
it is a little more steady but the spikes are still really bad

Gotcha. In that case, I strongly recommend working through the steps inside of our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are pristine and compatible with League. A lot of latency (ping) issues are caused by unoptimized network settings that simply don't play well with League.

Let me know if those steps helped.
